title: Queue Times
body:
Estimated time 3 min, actual time 30min.

Bronze 5 top/jungle.....make that 33min and counting

replies.body: Same with me, bronze 5, just waited 28 mins for a game. they need to fix this shit, pretty much cant play ranked during the week

Maybe your mmr is so low that not many players are matched up with you?
(I'm not trying to be rude, just a possibility).
Try to learn another role, I know you probably don't like support but that will almost guarantee a low queue time, so maybe play Lux support lmao

When I mention it in champ selectot seems like it's a common problem. I read that the way the system works, is that it places ppl in groups. If one person drops out then that group is re introduced as a group.the result is that there ends up being far more groups than solo in the queue and the system can't cope.

While this may be a rumor, I have noticed that if I make it into champ select again after someone misses a ban I seem to have the exact same players on my team.

I actually used to main support but am burned out on it.

Kobaya, 

I'm getting 75 minute queue times.  I'm your MMR (as I just got disconnected in pick while on your team.)

Dumped out of pick for the 3rd time today and on a 30 minute wait.... Sigh.

Were you the guy queuing as 'fill'

They need to get rid of the ban kick. 

tbh that would still leave us with long queues. I'm hoping its just the way they group ppl that's causing the issue.
To be honest I've been getting 10+ minute wait times even 4 stacking with all 5 roles covered. Maybe you're right and the matchmaking is cooked.
I would rather have the old system back as the queue times are significantly faster back then. Not worth spamming support nowadays just so I can get a game.
Yeah. Week day playing is no longer a thing for me. I generally only have a bit over an hour of free time. Waiting 30min for a game fks that up.
Bump for One hour. Nearly in game. wish me luck
38min...44min...50min...55min...been this way for the last week or so....58min. Nearly in but not everyone joined. Hope no-one forgets to ban next time.
